dct_title_s: Hispania cum finitimis regionibus novissime delineata
dct_description_sm: California shown as an island on globe at bottom right.

Includes a decorative cartouch with title. At bottom right is a female figure holding a cross with cherubs and a banner above two columns and two globes depiciting each hemisphere, held by angels and cherubs.
"Joan: Baptista Homann Sculpsit hanc cum potioribus reliquis Tabulis Norimbergae." at top left, inside neat line.
Legend shows Leucae Germ:, Gallicae, Hispanicae, and Milliaria Italica.
Issued in Heinrich Scherer's Atlas novus exhibens orbem terraqueum per naturae opera... .
